citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15 pm -
12:45 pm on 25-MAY-17.
The inspector knocked on the door, called the number provided and left a message, and waited at the facility for 30
minutes.
